name: MTV.COM Video Placement
description:
Get your Official Music Video placed on MTV.com Guaranteed Placement! or your Money Back. Requirements: --Cannot contain Drugs,Violence, or Sexual Content -Video Cannot be a Behind The Scenes or Interview must be an official music video -Video has to be of High Definition 1080p -Video must be uploaded on either a YouTube.com or Vimeo.com Accounts that's currently under the official channel name of the artist - If you don't meet requirement we will issue you a refund to your paypal account. - This does not include MTV Jams. This is strictly MTV.Com ONLY. Purchase Fee Includes: -Submission Paper work -quality Control Check -Encoding -Minor/Audio Video Adjustments (To Meet MTV requirement) Previous Clientele Jade Alston Rekkhan Floozy Laerec - Runnin' Away Cohen Robinson -Out Of My Head Turn around time Video can take anywhere from 1-4 days to post. Once video is up you will receive email with official "mtv.com/yourname" link.
ARTIST OR BAND EMAIL:
VIDEO URL:

name: Vevo Channel
description:
Would you like to have your own Vevo channel? Would you like to see your video next to the big names in the industry? If so, get yourself a vevo channel! Our mission at Viral Media Boost is to provide our clients with the highest quality service possible.Get Your Videos Right Next To The Stars and Have The Labels Looking For You! 100% Safe 100% Guaranteed Vevo Account Fast Delivery After Buying Your VEVO Account It Can Take Up To 3-4 Weeks For Your Account To Go Live. Place your youtube video url below. This will be your first video featured on your vevo account.

name: NETWORK SUBSCRIPTION
description:
NETWORK SUBSCRIPTION The soundzone is the digital music and media solution. Our network deliver Internationally to hundreds of digital and physical outlets including iTunes, Amazon, Spotify, YouTube, MTV, Google Music, Vevo, emusic, Rhapsody, Cricket / Muve Music, 7Digital, AT&T, Verizon and Radio. As new retailers and services are added to our network, your releases are automatically delivered to them automatically with no added fees. Release as many titles as you wish without paying additional fees per release. Our UPC and ISRC codes are free, and there are no annual renewal fees! new retailers and services are added to our network with important services such as digital distribution, mastering, marketing, management, licensing, publishing, and more

name: Mixtape / Album Promotion
description:
Our Company has gained Sponsorship from the companies stated below and that has allowed us to offer you not only marketing consulting and branding packages but guaranteed website placement for your mixtape. 
We also post your mixtape on torrents websites and programs to help you gain more exposure and shareability of your music by accessing fans worldwide and reaching the ears of other website/blog owners.

100% Guaranteed Results.

As an artist when releasing a new mixtape in the 21st Century the music industry has changed dynamically thanks to the internet, Now to Gain Attention of Record Labels, Talent Scouts, A&R's, Booking Agents, Producers, etc. they are all going to do online research using Google and social media outlets to see how easy you are to find, how many articles / reviews you've gotten on your mixtape, how many fans you have etc. Your job is to stand out and show them your uniqueness. Our company provides a simply and guaranteed solution to help you gain real results and new fans by getting your music on Multiple websites and blogs.
